text: Lào Cai is a province of Vietnam. Its capital is Lào Cai. Sapa is a popular village to visit. This Vietnamese province surrounds Fansipan, the highest mountain in Vietnam. The province shares a border with Yunnan province in China. Lào Cai City and Hekou City, China are built next to each other and share a border crossing. The Sapa Airport is currently being built. Category:Provinces of Vietnam
title: Lào Cai province
